levels.title: What is a Large Language Model (LLM)?
levels.description: A high-level introduction to models like GPT-4 and Gemini.

levels.title: Introduction to Prompt Engineering
levels.description: Understanding that how you ask is as important as what you ask.

levels.title: Your First Prompt: Zero-Shot Prompting
levels.description: Asking the model to do something without any examples.

levels.title: Core Concepts: Instructions, Context, and Input
levels.description: The basic building blocks of a good prompt.

levels.title: The Importance of Clear Instructions
levels.description: How to write specific and unambiguous commands.

levels.title: Few-Shot Prompting
levels.description: Providing the model with examples to guide its response.

levels.title: Choosing Good Examples for Few-Shot Prompts
levels.description: The art of selecting effective examples.

levels.title: Role Prompting
levels.description: Assigning a persona to the AI (e.g., 'You are a helpful assistant').

levels.title: Specifying the Output Format
levels.description: Asking for responses in JSON, Markdown, or other formats.

levels.title: Basic Prompting for Text Summarization
levels.description: Create prompts to summarize long pieces of text.

levels.title: Basic Prompting for Text Classification
levels.description: Create prompts to categorize text (e.g., sentiment analysis).

levels.title: Basic Prompting for Question Answering
levels.description: Extract answers from a given context.

levels.title: Iterative Prompt Development
levels.description: The process of refining your prompts based on model output.

levels.title: Introduction to AI Chat Interfaces
levels.description: Working with tools like ChatGPT, Claude, and Gemini.

levels.title: Understanding Model Temperature
levels.description: Controlling the randomness and creativity of the output.

levels.title: Understanding Top-p and Top-k
levels.description: Other parameters for controlling model output.

levels.title: The Dangers of Hallucinations
levels.description: Recognizing when an AI is making things up.

levels.title: Fact-Checking AI Outputs
levels.description: The importance of verifying information from an LLM.

levels.title: Introduction to Prompting for Creative Writing
levels.description: Using LLMs as a creative partner for stories and poems.

levels.title: Introduction to Prompting for Code Generation
levels.description: Asking an LLM to write simple scripts or functions.

levels.title: Debugging Code with an LLM
levels.description: Pasting code and error messages to get help.

levels.title: What is an API? (for Prompters)
levels.description: Understanding how to use LLMs programmatically.

levels.title: Using an LLM API with Python
levels.description: Make your first API call to a model like Gemini.

levels.title: System Prompts vs. User Prompts
levels.description: Understanding the different types of prompts in an API call.

levels.title: Managing Conversation History
levels.description: How to maintain context in a chat application.

levels.title: Ethical Considerations in Prompting
levels.description: Avoiding harmful, biased, or malicious uses.

levels.title: Understanding Model Biases
levels.description: Recognizing that LLMs reflect the biases in their training data.

levels.title: Introduction to Image Generation Models
levels.description: Understanding models like Midjourney and DALL-E.

levels.title: Your First Image Prompt
levels.description: The basics of describing a scene for an image model.

levels.title: Key Elements of an Image Prompt
levels.description: Subject, style, lighting, composition, etc.

levels.title: The Impact of 'Magic Words' in Image Prompts
levels.description: Terms like 'highly detailed' or 'cinematic lighting'.

levels.title: Negative Prompts
levels.description: Telling the model what *not* to include in the output.

levels.title: Controlling Style in Image Prompts
levels.description: Asking for specific artistic styles (e.g., 'in the style of Van Gogh').

levels.title: What are Tokens?
levels.description: The basic units of text that LLMs process.

levels.title: Understanding Context Window Limits
levels.description: Why you can't paste an entire book into a prompt.

levels.title: Project: Create a Prompt to Generate a Recipe
levels.description: Design a prompt that outputs a well-structured recipe.

levels.title: Project: Build a 'Study Buddy' Persona
levels.description: Create a role prompt for an AI that helps you study a topic.

levels.title: Project: Design an Image Prompt for a Fantasy Character
levels.description: Craft a detailed prompt to generate a unique character.

levels.title: Using Delimiters in Prompts
levels.description: How to separate instructions from input text clearly.

levels.title: The Power of Constraints
levels.description: Limiting the model's output to improve quality (e.g., 'answer in one sentence').

levels.title: Project: Write a Prompt to Explain a Complex Topic Simply
levels.description: Practice the 'Explain it to me like I'm 5' technique.

levels.title: The Concept of a 'Jailbreak'
levels.description: An introduction to adversarial prompting.

levels.title: Recognizing Common Prompt Injection Attacks
levels.description: Understand how malicious instructions can be hidden in user input.

levels.title: Chain-of-Thought (CoT) Prompting
levels.description: Encourage the model to 'think step by step' to solve complex problems.

levels.title: Zero-Shot Chain-of-Thought
levels.description: The magic of adding 'Let's think step by step' to your prompt.

levels.title: Common Use Cases for LLMs in Business
levels.description: Customer support, content creation, and data analysis.

levels.title: Evaluating Prompt Performance
levels.description: How to decide if one prompt is better than another.

levels.title: Keeping a Prompt Library
levels.description: The importance of saving and organizing your successful prompts.

levels.title: Prompting for Different Languages
levels.description: The basics of multilingual prompting and translation tasks.

levels.title: Using the AI as a Brainstorming Partner
levels.description: Techniques for generating ideas with an LLM.

levels.title: How to 'Temperature Sample' for Better Ideas
levels.description: Cranking up the temperature to get more creative outputs.

levels.title: Using LLMs for Role-Playing and Simulations
levels.description: Simulating a job interview or a difficult conversation.

levels.title: Prompting for Data Extraction
levels.description: Pulling structured information from unstructured text.

levels.title: Image Prompting: Aspect Ratios
levels.description: Controlling the dimensions of your generated image.

levels.title: Image Prompting: Camera Angles and Shot Types
levels.description: Using cinematic language to control your image composition.

levels.title: Image Prompting: In-painting and Out-painting
levels.description: Editing or extending parts of a generated image.

levels.title: History of Natural Language Processing
levels.description: From rule-based systems to neural networks.

levels.title: The Transformer Architecture: A High-Level Overview
levels.description: The breakthrough that enabled modern LLMs.

levels.title: The Concept of 'Attention'
levels.description: How Transformers decide which words are most important.

levels.title: How LLMs are Trained
levels.description: A simplified overview of pre-training and fine-tuning.

levels.title: The Importance of Data Quality in Training
levels.description: Garbage in, garbage out.

levels.title: Introduction to Vector Databases
levels.description: How information is stored for efficient retrieval.

levels.title: The Concept of Embeddings
levels.description: Turning words and sentences into numerical representations (vectors).

levels.title: Project: Create a 'Five-Act Story' Prompt
levels.description: Design a prompt that generates a story with a clear narrative structure.

levels.title: Project: Compare Outputs from Different Models
levels.description: Give the same prompt to GPT, Claude, and Gemini and analyze the differences.

levels.title: Project: Develop a Style Guide for Image Prompts
levels.description: Create a set of consistent prompts to generate images in a specific brand style.

levels.title: Prompt Chaining
levels.description: Using the output of one prompt as the input for another.

levels.title: Refinement Prompting
levels.description: Asking the model to critique and improve its own previous output.

levels.title: Persona-Driven Development
levels.description: Developing complex personas for the AI to adopt.

levels.title: The 'Golden Prompt' Myth
levels.description: Understanding that context and iteration are more important than a single perfect prompt.

levels.title: The Career of a Prompt Engineer
levels.description: What does a prompt engineer do day-to-day?

levels.title: Advanced Chain-of-Thought (CoT) Prompting
levels.description: Techniques like adding exemplars and structuring the thought process.

levels.title: Self-Consistency in CoT
levels.description: A technique to improve accuracy by sampling multiple reasoning paths.

levels.title: Tree of Thoughts (ToT) Prompting
levels.description: A more advanced technique where the LLM explores multiple reasoning paths.

levels.title: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
levels.description: The fundamental pattern of providing external knowledge to an LLM.

levels.title: Building a Simple RAG System
levels.description: Combine a document, a user query, and a prompt to answer questions.

levels.title: Introduction to Function Calling / Tool Use
levels.description: Enabling LLMs to use external tools and APIs.

levels.title: Designing a Tool for an LLM
levels.description: How to write a function description that an LLM can understand.

levels.title: Building a Weather Bot with Function Calling
levels.description: Create a bot that can fetch and report the real-time weather.

levels.title: Prompt Optimization Frameworks (e.g., DSPy)
levels.description: Programming, not prompting. A new paradigm for working with LLMs.

levels.title: Evaluating LLM Outputs Programmatically
levels.description: Using another LLM to grade or evaluate the quality of a response.

levels.title: Structured Data Extraction with JSON Schema
levels.description: Forcing the model to output valid JSON that matches a specific schema.

levels.title: Adversarial Prompting: Goal Hijacking
levels.description: Tricking a model into ignoring its original instructions.

levels.title: Adversarial Prompting: Prompt Leaking
levels.description: Tricking a model into revealing its own system prompt.

levels.title: Defensive Prompting Techniques
levels.description: Strategies to make your prompts more robust against injection.

levels.title: Fine-Tuning vs. Prompt Engineering
levels.description: Understanding the trade-offs and when to use each.

levels.title: Preparing a Dataset for Fine-Tuning
levels.description: The process of creating high-quality prompt-completion pairs.

levels.title: Introduction to OpenAI's API
levels.description: A deep dive into the most popular LLM API.

levels.title: Introduction to Google's Gemini API
levels.description: Exploring the features of Google's flagship model family.

levels.title: Introduction to Anthropic's Claude API
levels.description: Working with a model known for its large context window and safety features.

levels.title: The LLM Application Stack (LangChain, LlamaIndex)
levels.description: Frameworks for building complex applications on top of LLMs.

levels.title: Building Chains with LangChain
levels.description: Combine LLMs with other components to create applications.

levels.title: Indexing Data with LlamaIndex
levels.description: A framework for building RAG applications.

levels.title: Advanced Image Prompting: Image Weights and Seeds
levels.description: Fine-grained control over image generation.

levels.title: Image-to-Image Generation
levels.description: Using an existing image as a starting point for a new one.

levels.title: Prompting for Video Generation (Sora, Veo)
levels.description: The emerging field of text-to-video prompting.

levels.title: Introduction to AI Agents
levels.description: Systems that can reason, plan, and execute tasks autonomously.

levels.title: The ReAct Framework (Reason + Act)
levels.description: A powerful prompting pattern for creating agents.

levels.title: Building a Simple Research Agent
levels.description: An agent that can browse the web to answer a question.

levels.title: Cost and Latency Optimization
levels.description: Strategies for making your LLM applications cheaper and faster.

levels.title: Prompt Caching Strategies
levels.description: A simple way to reduce redundant API calls.

levels.title: The Business of Prompt Engineering
levels.description: How companies are hiring and integrating prompt engineering roles.

levels.title: Creating a Prompt Engineering Portfolio
levels.description: Showcasing your skills with well-documented prompt examples.

levels.title: Multi-Modal Models (e.g., Gemini 1.5)
levels.description: Models that can understand and process text, images, audio, and video.

levels.title: Prompting with Images
levels.description: Using images as part of the input to an LLM.

levels.title: Project: Build a Customer Support Bot
levels.description: A bot that can answer questions based on a set of FAQs using RAG.

levels.title: Project: Create a Function-Calling Calculator
levels.description: An LLM that uses calculator tools to solve math problems.

levels.title: Project: Develop a Red Teaming Prompt Set
levels.description: Create a suite of prompts designed to test the safety and robustness of an LLM.

levels.title: Project: Fine-tune a Small Open-Source Model
levels.description: Use a platform like Hugging Face to fine-tune a model on a custom dataset.

levels.title: Systematic Prompt Evaluation
levels.description: Using benchmarks and test sets to evaluate prompt performance objectively.

levels.title: Designing Evaluation Metrics for Generative Tasks
levels.description: The challenge of measuring the 'quality' of creative text.

levels.title: The Future of Prompting: Beyond Text
levels.description: Thinking about how we will interact with future AI models.

levels.title: Self-Correction Prompting
levels.description: Guiding a model to review and correct its own work.

levels.title: Graph-based Prompting for Complex Reasoning
levels.description: Representing problems as graphs to guide the LLM.

levels.title: The State of Open-Source LLMs
levels.description: An overview of models like Llama, Mistral, and Phi.

levels.title: Running LLMs Locally
levels.description: Using tools like Ollama to run models on your own machine.

levels.title: Prompting for Code Translation and Modernization
levels.description: e.g., 'Translate this COBOL code to Python'.

levels.title: Domain-Specific Prompt Engineering (Medical, Legal)
levels.description: The unique challenges of prompting in specialized fields.

levels.title: Memory and State Management in AI Agents
levels.description: How agents remember things and maintain state over long conversations.

levels.title: Multi-Agent Systems
levels.description: Simulating complex systems by having multiple AI agents interact.

levels.title: The AI Economist: Agent-based Economic Modeling
levels.description: Using multi-agent systems to study and design economies.

levels.title: Guardrails and Content Moderation
levels.description: Implementing safety filters and guardrails around LLM outputs.

levels.title: Prompt Management and Versioning Systems
levels.description: Tools for managing large sets of prompts in a production environment.

levels.title: A/B Testing Prompts in Production
levels.description: Live testing different prompts to see which performs better.

levels.title: Understanding Model Confidence Scores
levels.description: How to know when a model is uncertain about its answer.

levels.title: Prompting for Data Annotation
levels.description: Using LLMs to help create datasets for training other models.

levels.title: The Ethics of AI-Generated Content
levels.description: Disclosure, copyright, and the potential for misuse.

levels.title: The Economics of LLM APIs
levels.description: Understanding token costs and how to build a business case.

levels.title: Building a Business around Prompt Engineering
levels.description: Consulting, product development, and other opportunities.

levels.title: Advanced RAG: Query Transformations
levels.description: Techniques for rewriting user queries to improve retrieval.

levels.title: Advanced RAG: Re-ranking and Fusion
levels.description: Improving the relevance of retrieved documents before sending to the LLM.

levels.title: The Future of Human-Computer Interaction
levels.description: How LLMs are changing the way we interact with computers.

levels.title: The Role of Prompt Engineering in an AI-First World
levels.description: Where the role fits in a mature AI development team.

levels.title: Graph of Thoughts (GoT) Prompting
levels.description: Modeling information as a graph to enable more complex reasoning.

levels.description: A new frontier in prompting where the LLM explores the algorithm search space.

levels.description: Using an LLM to generate and select the best prompts for a task.

levels.description: Understanding the next generation of model architectures.

levels.description: A deep dive into the technical challenges of making AI safe.

levels.description: A method for guiding AI behavior based on a set of principles.

levels.description: The science of reverse-engineering neural networks to understand how they work.

levels.description: Creating complex, emergent simulations with interacting AI agents.

levels.description: Designing systems where an AI can critique and improve its own prompts and code.

levels.description: Exploring concepts like long-term memory, planning, and recursive self-improvement.

levels.description: Using LLMs to generate hypotheses and analyze scientific literature.

levels.description: Exploring the deeper questions about intelligence and communication.

levels.description: The skills required to manage a team of prompt engineers and AI specialists.

levels.description: Design and build an agent that can perform a complex, multi-step task.

levels.description: Document and share a new, effective prompting strategy with the community.

levels.description: Conduct a thorough safety analysis of a major LLM and publish your findings.

levels.description: Envisioning the future of work and creativity in the age of AI.

levels.description: The skills to communicate complex AI concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences.

levels.description: A review of the different philosophical and technical viewpoints.

levels.description: A philosophical reflection on the nature of instruction, creativity, and partnership with AI.

levels.description: Techniques to improve retrieval by generating hypothetical documents.

levels.description: Retrieving larger chunks for context while embedding smaller chunks.

levels.description: A curated list of essential reading on AI, cognition, and philosophy.
